snippet: Senator Robert Menendez, Democrat of New Jersey, set up the fund over a year ago to pay for costs stemming from a deepening inquiry into his relationship with a political donor.
abstract: Senate Select Committee on Ethics reports that Sen Robert Menendez, indicted on federal bribery charges, raised nearly $413,000 for his legal defense fund in first quarter of 2015; figures show that Menendez continued to collect contributions from prominent donors even as indictment loomed.
lead_paragraph: Senator Robert Menendez, Democrat of New Jersey, set up the fund over a year ago to pay for costs stemming from a deepening inquiry into his relationship with a political donor.

headline.main: Senator Menendez’s Legal Fund Raised $431,000 in First Quarter of 2015
headline.print_headline: Menendez’s Legal Fund Raised $431,000 in First 3 Months of This Year, Report Says
